verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I know where I'm goin', And I know who's a goin' with me, I know who I love But the dear knows who I'll marry!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I have stockings of silk, Shoes of fine green leather, Combs to buckle my hair, And a ring for every finger.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Some say he's black, But I say he's bonny, The fairest of them all My handsome, winsome Johnny.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Feather beds are soft, And painted rooms are bonny, But I would leave them all To go with my love Johnny.
